title: Most bizarre reason for afk
body:
So in this ARAM game, had a losing composition, players don't understand champion or build, you know the usual stuff. 
Then there is this Sivir on our team, she accidentally ulted (I assume so), stood still for a bit then typed bye and went back to base, then refused to contribute anymore. 

First time seeing someone tilt themselves so easily then afk which is hilarious and sad at the same time.
I guess the current meta has made people care less and less about the game.

replies.body: Her house was probably on fy0r. Don't presume.dont be so self centered. This games a failure for punishing leaving etc. Put a banlist or make it so blocked players can't be queued into your games. Same with the minimum concede time. Its a negative to the system.
